page.title: 19LIFE STYLES
page.content: A popular{social activity}of Southminster adults is drinking beer and spirits in one of the seven public houses. They also play a variety of games. These include{darts {dominoes, cards, snooker and pool. Bar meals or snacks can be obtained in most of them. One{public house}which also is an hotel has a beer garden where children can play. {Bar games}tournaments are held between the various establishments throughout the Dengie Hundred. Some of the public houses are {privately owned}and are{'free houses' that is to say they sell their own choice of beer. Others are owned by a {brewery}and only provide beer made by that brewery.
